title: Transformation of iron oxides in amorphous nanoscale zero-valent iron (A-nZVI) and nZVI: effect on Sb(III) removal affinity and stability
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,4020-4028
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00158C, Paper
Qi Cheng, Qingrui Li, Xiaoqin Li, Weizhen Liu, Zhang Lin, Liyuan Chai
We compared the aging products of nZVI and A-nZVI and their binding with Sb(III).
